#BlackMagicCraft #Episode089

In this episode I sculpt a serious threat for the table. This is how you can take scrap XPS foam, utility knife, and some hot glue to create a massive earth elemental or stone golem miniature. 

Check out Miniature Market for all your tabletop needs: http://www.miniaturemarket.com/blackmagiccraft

title: Building an EARTH ELEMENTAL Miniature for Dungeons & Dragons - EASY BUILD!
